item.title: Reading List for Financial Analyst
item.author: mailto:cai-joseph@outlook.com (Joseph Cai)
item.description: Written by Current or Former Goldman Sachs Employees. This list provides an extensive reading guide for finance professionals and enthusiasts seeking industry insights, investment strategies, and historical perspectives.
